channel.title: Sons of Heaven
channel.description:
# Sons of Heaven
![](upload://fctv0280NHSlvWbs8B1zSesHybo.jpeg)
> Sons of Heaven is an NFT project based on the Radix Network. Each of the 5,020 Sons of Heaven follow the Emperor's Call in one of these ranks: Infantry, Cavalry, Officer, the Royal Assassin or the Imperial Family itself. **Price of each NFT** : 250 XRD **Links** : * [Website](https://sonsofheaven.net/) **Social:** * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/sons_of_heaven)
